item.description:
What: We will be joining with other spiritually oriented groups in the area for a picnic/potluck. You are welcome to attend even if you haven't made it to one of the ACIM groups yet.

Where: Chatfield Hollow State Park in Killingworth, CT, south of Middletown. We will be in a picnic area near the pond. http://www.stateparks...

Chatfield Hollow State Park
381 Route 80
Killingworth, Connecticut 06419
Phone: 860-663-2030 860-663-2030
Toll Free: 866-287-2757

When: Sunday, 9/20, 12:00 - 4:00.

Please bring something to share for the potluck. Let Theresa know what you are bringing so she can coordinate. It is unclear if we will be able to do any grilling. We'll keep you posted as we get more information. You may also want to bring a chair and any other amenities/toys. Drinks, paper plates, and plastic utensils will be provided.

Alternate Rain/Cold Location: To be determined.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: End of Summer Picnic September 20th
